alert.note: Alert for Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 1:57AM MDT until April 05 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In South Dakota, the Northern Black Hills and the Northern Foot Hills. In Wyoming, the Wyoming Black Hills. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
